title: Seriously Riot? Still no answers for the crashing for Yosemite Mac users?
body:
I'm over it, waited so long for you guys to fix this shit ever since it started and still nothing's changed, got into a low priority queue because of your mac client and I can't return to my first placement match, simply because it won't let me.
And to think now I'm going to get punished for it post-game with reports? Yeh siq 1

replies.body: Please, Riot, you have to look into this...
